name: Support Class
description:
Support Class is turn based RPG where you play as a support mage trying to carry a tank that plays like a damage class.
Use your abilities in each fight to keep yourself and your reckless teammate alive.

Tutorial:

Wait for your action bar to fill up and use the mouse to select your action and then a target. The knight will attack enemies randomly when his action bar is filled.
Itens can be used regardless of the action bar.

If either you or the knight dies it's game over.
